Quaver Map Object¶

class reamber.quaver.QuaMapObj.QuaMapObj(audioFile: str = '', songPreviewTime: int = 0, backgroundFile: str = '', mapId: int = -1, mapSetId: int = -1, mode: str = 'Keys4', title: str = '', artist: str = '', source: str = '', tags: str = '', creator: str = '', difficultyName: str = '', description: str = '', editorLayers: List[str] = <factory>, customAudioSamples: List[str] = <factory>, soundEffects: List[str] = <factory>, notes: reamber.quaver.lists.QuaNotePkg.QuaNotePkg = <factory>, bpms: reamber.quaver.lists.QuaBpmList.QuaBpmList = <factory>, svs: reamber.quaver.lists.QuaSvList.QuaSvList = <factory>)¶

Bases: reamber.quaver.QuaMapObjMeta.QuaMapObjMeta, reamber.base.MapObj.MapObj

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

data() → Dict[str, reamber.base.lists.TimedList.TimedList]¶

Gets the notes, bpms and svs as a dictionary

readFile(filePath: str)¶

Reads a .qua, loads inplace, hence it doesn’t return anything

Parameters

filePath – The path to the .qua file.

writeFile(filePath: str)¶

Writes a .qua, doesn’t return anything.

Parameters

filePath – The path to a new .qua file.

bpms: QuaBpmList¶
notes: QuaNotePkg¶
svs: QuaSvList¶
